title: Sweden’s Volvo Cars on track for worst trading day ever as shares plunge over 18%
summary_full: The Sweden-based automaker posted a substantial drop in fourth-quarter profit, citing tariffs, currency effects and weak demand.
summary_public: The Sweden-based automaker posted a substantial drop in fourth-quarter profit, citing tariffs, currency effects and weak demand.
